entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
